subject: College Athletics
Baseball
Sporting Goods
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A.’s new testing standard for bats — meant in part to protect pitchers — has altered the game as drastically as the introduction of aluminum bats in 1974.
snippet: The N.C.A.A.’s new testing standard for bats — meant in part to protect pitchers — has altered the game as drastically as the introduction of aluminum bats in 1974.
